page.title: 16History of the Lighthouses
page.content: In our area there are {3} Lighthouses, The North Low, The High Lighthouse and The South Low Lighthouse. The North Low Lighthouse is painted grey and is nearest to North Killingholme Haven.It is{37}feet high.The South Low Lighthouse is painted white and is{45}feet high. It is nearest to the South Killingholme Haven. The High Lighthouse is the tallest for it measures{78}feet high and much slimmer and painted red. The first of the Lighthouses to be built was the High Lighthouse which was built in {1831}. In {1836}the South Low Lighthouse was built . The land that they were built on cost { {Â£105}. The third Lighthouse was built in {1851}at a cost of {Â£580},and in{ {1876}the High Lighthouse was rebuilt.
